items.title: Nvidia to accelerate Siemens chip-design tools using its GPUs
items.creator: Tim De Chant
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: Nvidia to accelerate Siemens chip-design tools using its GPUs

images.alt: Signage at the 2026 CES Unveiled event in Las Vegas

items.content: Nvidia announced today at CES 2026 that it would help Siemens’ electronic design automation (EDA) software run on its GPUs in an attempt to speed up the chip-design process. Nearly all computer chips today are designed using EDA tools, and as chip features get smaller and transistors more numerous, the process has grown more computationally […]

items.title: How World Cup champion Mario Götze built a parallel career as an angel investor
items.creator: Anna Heim
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: How World Cup champion Mario Götze built a parallel career as an angel investor
items.content: Mario Götze will go down in soccer history as the player who scored the winning goal that made Germany the 2014 FIFA World Cup champion. But he is also an increasingly seasoned angel investor.

items.translated_title: Commonwealth Fusion Systems installs reactor magnet, lands deal with Nvidia

images.alt: An engineer stands inside a superconducting magnet.
An illustration shows a digital twin of the Sparc fusion reactor

items.content: The fusion power frontrunner said that construction on its Sparc reactor was proceeding as planned. Meanwhile, it's building a digital twin to help dial it in.

items.translated_title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
items.content: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player after Luminar's bankruptcy.
